conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a cutaway/isometric 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, floor planes, and an exposed interior (ceiling removed).

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable interior volumes; isometric view with clean cutaway. Minor simplification at some wall junctions/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency match (living/dining, kitchen/utility/servant, 4 bedrooms, toilets, balconies, dress). Some proportional differences are visible (notably dining/bedroom dimensions and a few partition lengths), but the main wall network is consistent.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present in living/dining and bedrooms; kitchen and bathroom fixtures are included. Minor inconsistencies in exact placement/scale relative to the 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clean and readable with good lighting; however, text labels/dimensions are overlaid in the 3D render and some openings are not fully detailed.

detected_errors.description: Noticeable proportion/dimension drift between 2D plan and 3D render (e.g., dining and some bedroom/toilet spans), though adjacency remains correct.
Doors/windows/openings appear simplified; exact counts/sizes and some placements are not fully verifiable against the 2D plan.
Text labels/dimensions are present in the 3D image, reducing presentation cleanliness.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, but with moderate proportional drift and some simplified opening details.
